title: Hayate no Gotoku! Heaven Is a Place on Earth
original_name: 劇場版 ハヤテのごとく! HEAVEN IS A PLACE ON EARTH
opening_song: "Bokura, Kakeyuku Sora e (僕ら、駆け行く空へ)" by Haruka Yamazaki (Luca Suirenji)
ending_song: "Heaven is a Place on Earth" by fripSide
sinopse:
Hayate, Nagi and the gang spend the last days of summer break at Nishizawa's countryside vacation home. But a mysterious spirit has concocted a scheme to separate the butler from his young mistress.

(Source: ANN)
